rows.label: qev051502_MSG0003
rows.name:
I can assure you, I have never once forgotten the
humiliation of that loss. It has fueled my training![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051502_MSG0004
rows.name:
I will show you the results now... The true form of the
sword taught to me by my brothers![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051502_MSG0005
rows.name: Come at me with everything you have![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051502_MSG0007
rows.name:
I remember facing you that day with all that I had,
though it was not enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051502_MSG0008
rows.name:
When you threw my brothers' swords in my face,
their will was made clear to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051502_MSG0009
rows.name:
I have trained each day—each hour—since then in
order to respect their wishes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051502_MSG0010
rows.name:
I will show you the results now... The true form of the
sword taught to me by my brothers![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051502_MSG0011
rows.name: Come at me with everything you have![ST:wait ]
